basics.name: Ragul Kachiyappan
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a curious Engineer with a wide array of interests. I am now focusing on attaining mastery over Backend Engineering and its related ecosystem. I have proficiency in Backend Engineering, Django, Python ecosystem, Linux ecosystem, AWS, Azure, Generative AI, MLOps and Natural Language Processing. Strong proponent of FOSS principles and enjoy collaboration with open source communities. I have made significant contributions to FastAPI, DSPy from Stanford NLP, Chroma DB, Langchain, Llamaindex and ragas.

work.name: Techjays
highlights: Led enterprise-level software development initiatives, earning recognition for exceptional technical contributions
Established and led structured mentorship program for junior developers and interns, improving team productivity and reducing onboarding time
Drove end-to-end project lifecycle excellence across all SDLC phases
Maintained production systems with 99.9% uptime
Authored compelling technical proposals and participated in strategic client discussions
Created comprehensive technical documentation and developed proof-of-concepts and MVPs
